name: Monster Go - Catch Them All!
description:
*THINK YOU'RE A PUZZLE MASTER?*
*ARE YOU THE BEST THERE EVER WAS?*
*TEST YOUR SKILLS & CONNECT THEM ALL!*

Connect as many same-colored MONSTERS as you can. Close squares for maximum points! Sound easy? It's not, and this game will be sure to challenge puzzlers of all levels! There are three exciting and fun game modes to choose from and tons more bonuses and extras!

Unlock all the rewards to become a Monster-Master! Challenge your friends and and post your scores!

Use Power-Ups to help get more points! Add More Time, More Moves, or choose to re-arrange the board to maximize your score!

INCLUDES:
- Endless levels
- 20+ Awards
- 3 Game Modes
- 4+ Power-Ups
- Share your scores

START CATCHING THEM ALL NOW!
